summary: A young Korean-American girl, abducted and forced into prostitution by domestic human traffickers, cooperates with her captors in a desperate ploy to survive.
cast: Jamie Chung|Beau Bridges|Matt O'Leary|Eddie Martinez|Tantoo Cardinal|Tracey Fairaway|Scott Mechlowicz|Roman Roytberg|John Farrage|Laura Kai Chen|Joseph Steven Yang|Tony Doupe|Russell Hodgkinson|Bhama Roget|Jon S. title: Eden
